testcase.classname: AdactIn Automation End to End testing
testcase.name: To check Hotel name, Location, room type, Total Day, price per night are same in Booking confirmation page as they were selected in previous screen
testcase.system-out: Given User launch the AdactIn Hotel Reservation application using URL as in the test data.passed When User enter the User-name in the welcome page...........................passed And User enter the Password in the welcome page.............................passed And User click on the Login button..........................................passed When User select the Location '"Sydney"'...................................passed And User select the hotel '"Hotel Creek"'..................................passed And User select Room type '"Standard"'.....................................passed And User select the Number of Rooms '2'....................................passed And User select the Check-in-Date as "25/06/2019"...........................passed And User select the Check-out-Date as "26/06/2019"..........................passed And User select the Adult per Room as "1 - One".............................passed And User click on the Search button.........................................passed And User click on the Radio Button to select the hotel......................passed And User click on the Continue Button.......................................passed Then Verify the total data are same in booking confirmation page '"Sydney"' '"Hotel Creek"' '"Standard"' '"AUD $ 125"' '1'.passed
